solution_line_template: She has ${balance_after_spending} left in the bank because {initial_balance} - {total_spent} = <<{initial_balance}-{total_spent}={balance_after_spending}>>{balance_after_spending}
She can get {num_bills} five dollar bills because {balance_after_spending} / {bill_denomination} = <<{balance_after_spending}/{bill_denomination}={num_bills_float}>>{num_bills_float}
This is equal to ${total_withdrawn} because {num_bills} x {bill_denomination} = <<{num_bills}*{bill_denomination}={total_withdrawn}>>{total_withdrawn}
She has ${remaining_balance} left in the account because {balance_after_spending} - {total_withdrawn} = <<{balance_after_spending}-{total_withdrawn}={remaining_balance}>>{remaining_balance}
